languages.text: "Ты говоришь о вере. О заветах Империума. О том, что превыше всего и всех — об Императоре. Все верно, я — Его избранни{mf|к|ца}, и я несу Его огонь во тьму простора Коронус".
"You speak of faith. Of the Imperium's tenets. Of the one who is above all, the Emperor. You are correct. I am His chosen, and I carry His flame into the darkness of the Koronus Expanse."
languages.original_text: "Ты говоришь о вере. О заветах Империума. О том, что превыше всего и всех — об Императоре. Все верно, я — Его избранни{mf|к|ца}, и я несу Его огонь во тьму простора Коронус".

"You speak of faith. Of the Imperium's tenets. Of the one who is above all, the Emperor. You are correct. I am His chosen, and I carry His flame into the darkness of the Koronus Expanse."

languages.text: « Vous parlez de foi, des doctrines de l'Imperium... de Celui qui est au-dessus de tout : l'Empereur lui-même. Vous avez raison. Je suis son {mf|élu|élue} et je porte sa flamme dans l'obscurité des Étendues de Koronus. »
languages.original_text: "You speak of faith. Of the Imperium's tenets. Of the one who is above all, the Emperor. You are correct. I am His chosen, and I carry His flame into the darkness of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: « Vous parlez de foi, des doctrines de l'Imperium... de Celui qui est au-dessus de tout : l'Empereur lui-même. Vous avez raison. Je suis son {mf|élu|élue} et je porte sa flamme dans l'obscurité des Étendues de Koronus. »

languages.text: “你对信仰、帝国的信条与至高神皇的解释很贴切。我就是祂的选民，我会将把他的火焰传播到科罗努斯扩区的黑暗中去。”
languages.original_text: "You speak of faith. Of the Imperium's tenets. Of the one who is above all, the Emperor. You are correct. I am His chosen, and I carry His flame into the darkness of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: “你对信仰、帝国的信条与至高神皇的解释很贴切。我就是祂的选民，我会将把他的火焰传播到科罗努斯扩区的黑暗中去。”

languages.text: "Ihr sprecht vom Glauben. Von den Grundsätzen des Imperiums. Von dem, der über allem steht, dem Imperator. Ihr habt recht. Ich bin {mf|sein Auserwählter|seine Auserwählte}, und ich trage seine Flamme in die Dunkelheit der Koronus-Ausdehnung."
languages.original_text: "You speak of faith. Of the Imperium's tenets. Of the one who is above all, the Emperor. You are correct. I am His chosen, and I carry His flame into the darkness of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sprecht vom Glauben. Von den Grundsätzen des Imperiums. Von dem, der über allem steht, dem Imperator. Ihr habt recht. Ich bin {mf|sein Auserwählter|seine Auserwählte}, und ich trage seine Flamme in die Dunkelheit der Koronus-Ausdehnung."

languages.text: «Habla de fe. De los preceptos del Imperium. Del que está por encima de todos, nuestro Emperador. Estás en lo cierto. Soy su {mf|elegido|elegida}, y porto su llama por la oscuridad de la Extensión de Koronus».
languages.original_text: "You speak of faith. Of the Imperium's tenets. Of the one who is above all, the Emperor. You are correct. I am His chosen, and I carry His flame into the darkness of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: «Habla de fe. De los preceptos del Imperium. Del que está por encima de todos, nuestro Emperador. Estás en lo cierto. Soy su {mf|elegido|elegida}, y porto su llama por la oscuridad de la Extensión de Koronus».

languages.text: 「それは信仰だ。帝国の信条について語っている。すべての者の上に立つ皇帝のことだ。お前は正しい。私は皇帝に選ばれし者であり、皇帝の炎をコロヌス・エクスパンスの闇の中へ掲げる者だ」
languages.original_text: "You speak of faith. Of the Imperium's tenets. Of the one who is above all, the Emperor. You are correct. I am His chosen, and I carry His flame into the darkness of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: 「それは信仰だ。帝国の信条について語っている。すべての者の上に立つ皇帝のことだ。お前は正しい。私は皇帝に選ばれし者であり、皇帝の炎をコロヌス・エクスパンスの闇の中へ掲げる者だ」

languages.text: "İnançtan, İmparatorluk'un ilkelerinden, her şeyden üstün olan İmparator'dan bahsediyorsun. Haklısın. Ben O'nun seçilmişiyim ve O'nun alevini Koronus Enginliği'nin karanlığına taşıyorum."
languages.original_text: "You speak of faith. Of the Imperium's tenets. Of the one who is above all, the Emperor. You are correct. I am His chosen, and I carry His flame into the darkness of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "İnançtan, İmparatorluk'un ilkelerinden, her şeye üstün İmparator'dan bahsediyorsun. Haklısın. Ben O'nun seçilmişiyim ve O'nun alevini Koronus Enginliği'nin karanlığına taşıyorum."
